title: News digest [No. 3]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Mechanized hiking in East Gippsland with a four-wheel drive vehicle which “swims” and makes its own road; infested trees are destroyed in the fight against the sirex wasp; business principles are taught and put into practice at Port Albert where children make and sell pottery; divers test their reactions and equipment under ice.
